short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For many of us, inspiration is triggered by the quips and quotations of others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to add and remove your own inspirational quotes that will display randomly in the browser when you open a new tab in chrome.
